text:
@FlowConFR @holly_cummins So WHAT does "cloud native" actually mean?
Everyone has their definition.

" If #cloud native has to be a synonym for anything, it should be 'idempotent'*. "

#flowcon

* That's latin for "having the same power". (I knew this literary background would come in handy someday) https://t.co/AnoTGdBGfM
